item.title: HomeTrust Bancshares Inc 10-K
item.description: HomeTrust Bancshares Inc, which is in the Savings Institution, Federally Chartered [6035] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 12, 2022 had 38208 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
